questions.question: Question 1
questions.details: Find the value of 75 – 15 ÷ 3 + 6 × 2?

questions.details: Find the value of 5/6 × 3/4

questions.details: Find the product of 20/3 and 1/12

questions.question: Question 4
questions.details: Find the value of 4/9 ÷ 6

questions.question: Question 5
questions.details: Huiyu's age is 7/4 times of Raj what is the ratio of Raj's to Huiyi's age?

questions.question: Question 6
questions.details: Find the edge length of a cube with a volume of 216 cm³.

questions.question: Question 7
questions.details: Which of the following equals 31.02 × 400?

questions.question: Question 8
questions.details: What percentage of a 40-student class are boys (10 boys, 30 girls)?

questions.question: Question 9
questions.details: Find the original price of a watch that costs $52 after a 20% discount.

questions.question: Question 10
questions.details: Find the value of 2.04 ÷ 30

questions.question: Question 11
questions.details: Find the ratio of women to men at a party with 9 men and 30 adults.

questions.question: Question 12
questions.details: What percentage of Daniel's savings remained after spending 60% on a toy car and 20% of the rest on a pencil case?

questions.question: Question 14
questions.details: Find the value of (130 – 80 ÷ 2) – 15 × 4

questions.question: Question 15
questions.details: Find the value of 2/3 - 1/4

questions.question: Question 16
questions.details: Fine the value of 4(1/8) × 8

questions.question: Question 17
questions.details: Find the simplest ratio of 8 minutes to 1 hour.

questions.question: Question 18
questions.details: Find the full volume of water in a 7 × 4 × 2 m tank

questions.question: Question 19
questions.details: Find the mass of each packet if Jenny packed 7 kg of sugar into 8 equal packets.

questions.question: Question 20
questions.details: What fraction of Rou Li's money did he spend if he spent 20% on chocolates and 60% on candies?

questions.question: Question 21
questions.details: if 45 : 10 : 35 = 27 : 6 : □ Find the value of □.

questions.question: Question 22
questions.details: What percentage discount did Customer Y receive if they paid $570 for a watch originally priced like Customer X's $480 watch with a 20% discount?

questions.question: Question 23
questions.details: How many boys were in the group if the average mass of 6 girls was 44 kg, the average mass of the boys was 37 kg, and the overall average mass was 40 kg?

questions.question: Question 24
questions.details: How many boxes can be filled with 5 liters of milk, each measuring 2x5x10 cm?

questions.question: Question 25
questions.details: Emily planted spinach 9/25 in her garden, tomatoes on 0.41, and wheat in the remaining area. What decimal fraction is the wheat area?

questions.question: Question 26
questions.details: How many candies did Nam originally have if sharing 3 each leaves 11, and sharing 5 each leaves 3 friends without any?

questions.question: Question 27
questions.details: If 2 + 0.5 + 0.06 + 0.002 = a and 2+0.0+0.01+0.009=b, what is the difference between a and b?
